mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_job (id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, tenant_id, project_id, dtuic_tenant_id, app_type, job_id, job_key, job_name, task_id, create_user_id, is_deleted, `type`, is_restart, business_date, cyc_time, dependency_type, flow_job_id, status, task_type, max_retry_num, node_address, version_id, source_type, compute_type) VALUES (#{id}, now(), now(), #{tenantId}, #{projectId}, #{dtuicTenantId}, #{appType}, #{jobId}, #{jobKey}, #{jobName}, #{taskId}, #{createUserId}, #{isDeleted}, #{type}, #{isRestart}, #{businessDate}, #{cycTime}, #{dependencyType}, #{flowJobId}, #{status}, #{taskType}, #{maxRetryNum}, #{nodeAddress}, #{versionId}, #{sourceType}, #{computeType})
